        <div class="l-grid l-grid--gutters">
         <div class="l-grid__col l-grid__col--transparent">
          <div class="l-grid__content">
           <div class="l-grid__content l-grid__content--inset u-app-hide" data-content-id="c1d32a66-4cf9-4c34-a357-e418a4251b47" data-layout="Basic Layout" id="left-rail-content">
            <div class="l-grid__content-title u-text-h5">
             GREAT READS
            </div>
            <div class="l-grid l-grid--gutters">
             <div class="l-grid__col l-grid__col--transparent">
              <div class="l-grid__content">
               <div class="sc-cxFLnm eomcd">
                <div class="p-forge-list" data-columns='{"XS":1,"S":1,"M":1,"L":1,"XL":1}' data-content-id="b244eed9-2130-492b-98ab-268055656c33">
                 <div class="p-forge-list--list p-forge-list--XS-1-itemsPerRow p-forge-list--S-1-itemsPerRow p-forge-list--M-1-itemsPerRow p-forge-list--L-1-itemsPerRow p-forge-list--XL-1-itemsPerRow">
                  <div class="p-forge-list-item l-grid__content">
                   <div class="l-grid l-grid--gutters">
                    <div class="l-grid__col l-grid__col--transparent">
                     <div class="l-grid__content">
                      <div class="sc-hHftDr cqpJdB">
                       <div class="p-featured-content p-featured-content--circle p-featured-content--wrapped p-featured-content--fixed">
                        <div class="p-featured-content__media">
                         <a href="/news/featured/wrigley-field-lights-night-games">
                          <div class="p-featured-content__media__container">
                           <div class="p-image sc-bqyKva hOueHU">

                    <img class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-srcset="//img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w2208/mlb/etbyxl5kho2bt0ygjhkc.jpg 2208w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w1536/mlb/etbyxl5kho2bt0ygjhkc.jpg 1536w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w1024/mlb/etbyxl5kho2bt0ygjhkc.jpg 1024w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w640/mlb/etbyxl5kho2bt0ygjhkc.jpg 640w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w372/mlb/etbyxl5kho2bt0ygjhkc.jpg 372w"/>

                  <div class="p-forge-list-item l-grid__content">
                   <div class="l-grid l-grid--gutters">
                    <div class="l-grid__col l-grid__col--transparent">
                     <div class="l-grid__content">
                      <div class="sc-hHftDr cqpJdB">
                       <div class="p-featured-content p-featured-content--circle p-featured-content--wrapped p-featured-content--fixed">

            <div class="l-grid__content-title u-text-h5">
             SOCIAL JUSTICE
            </div>
            <div class="l-grid l-grid--gutters">
             <div class="l-grid__col l-grid__col--transparent">
              <div class="l-grid__content">
               <div class="sc-hHftDr cqpJdB">
                <div class="p-featured-content p-featured-content--default p-featured-content--wrapped p-featured-content--fixed" data-content-id="03103278-0b1e-44bf-bfd5-d8807d1c6bd0">
                 <div class="p-featured-content__media">
                  <a href="/diversity-and-inclusion/social-justice">
                   <div class="p-featured-content__media__container">
                    <div class="p-image sc-bqyKva hOueHU">

                <div class="p-image sc-bqyKva hOueHU">

                  <img class="lazyload" data-sizes="auto" data-srcset="//img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w2208/mlb/pi7v1dchumsah9cprr5v.jpg 2208w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w1536/mlb/pi7v1dchumsah9cprr5v.jpg 1536w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w1024/mlb/pi7v1dchumsah9cprr5v.jpg 1024w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w640/mlb/pi7v1dchumsah9cprr5v.jpg 640w, //img.mlbstatic.com/mlb-images/image/private/t_16x9/t_w372/mlb/pi7v1dchumsah9cprr5v.jpg 372w"/>
                 </div>
                </div>
               </div>
              </a>
             </div>
             <div class="p-featured-content__body">
              <a href="https://www.mlb.com/youth-baseball-softball" target="_blank">
              </a>
              <div class="p-featured-content__text">
               <div class="p-wysiwyg sc-idOhPF sc-dIUggk czrGX iYSgWq">
                <h5 id="a-hrefhttpswwwmlbcomyouth-baseball-softball-target_blank-mlb-has-15-youth-baseball--softball-programs-find-one-thats-right-for-youa">
                 <a href="https://www.mlb.com/youth-baseball-softball" target="_blank">
                  MLB has 15+ youth baseball &amp; softball programs; find one that's right for you
                 </a>
                </h5>

              </div>

            </div>
